title: Read the data

steps.hint: Dumping the data shows us how the computer sees the data, but we need to turn it into something humans can read and use. The computer is using a language called 'JSON'. Think of 'JSON' as nice little shipping container you can use to send data anywhere. Change the second line to say `dumpJSON data`.

Dumping the data shows us how the computer sees the data, but we need to turn it into something humans can read and use. The computer is using a language called 'JSON'. Think of 'JSON' as nice little shipping container you can use to send data anywhere. Change the second line to say `dumpJSON data`.

completion_text: Isn't this starting to make a lot more sense? The data you are grabbing might have a lot of strange-looking symbols in it, but they are just there to help the computer read it! But with a bit of learning you too can read and use this data.
